[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Oracle DoS] Can get_normalized_asset_price at lines 59-63 revert or timeout, causing get_receipt_value to fail and block all receipt valuations? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: update_receipt_value()] [Module Dependencies] If vault_oracle, vault_utils, or receipt modules have bugs, how does it affect receipt_adaptor security? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Zero Share Ratio] If get_share_ratio at line 49 returns zero (total shares is zero), does mul_d at line 65 handle it correctly? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Zero Price] If principal_price from get_normalized_asset_price at lines 59-63 is zero, does mul_with_oracle_price at lines 66-69 and 70-73 return zero correctly? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Maximum Values] If all value components (shares, pending_deposit, claimable_principal) are at maximum, can the summation at line 75 overflow u256? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [All Zero Values] If shares, pending_deposit_balance, and claimable_principal are all zero, does get_receipt_value correctly return zero? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: update_receipt_value()] [First Update] On the first call to update_receipt_value for a new receipt asset, can uninitialized state cause issues in finish_update_asset_value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: update_receipt_value()] [Timestamp Ordering] If clock.timestamp_ms() at line 35 is less than the previous update timestamp, can it corrupt value freshness tracking? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Clock Consistency] If different Clock objects are passed to update_receipt_value and get_receipt_value, can timestamp inconsistencies cause issues? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Share Ratio Attack] Can an attacker manipulate the vault's total_shares or total_usd_value before get_share_ratio at line 49 to inflate share_ratio and increase receipt value? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Share Ratio Staleness] If get_share_ratio at line 49 uses stale asset values, can outdated share_ratio cause incorrect receipt valuations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Share Ratio Zero Division] If total_shares in the vault is zero when get_share_ratio is called at line 49, does it revert or return a default value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Pending Deposit Inflation] Can an attacker artificially inflate pending_deposit_balance at line 67 to increase receipt value without actually depositing assets? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Claimable Principal Manipulation] Can an attacker manipulate claimable_principal at line 71 to increase receipt value without legitimate claims? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/receipt_adaptor.move] [Function: get_receipt_value()] [Component Imbalance] If pending_deposit_value is very large but shares is zero, can this create an imbalanced valuation that's exploitable? (High)
